name: Minesweeper: Classic ▦
description:
Relive the days of playing Classic Minesweeper in the palm of your hand! Have hours of Nostalgic fun with the most addictive game in history. The game is simple, try to avoid the bombs to clear the minefield to win the game!

Features:
- Fastest, smoothest and most intuitive interface to ensure your game is not interrupted and you play at your pace
- Adjustable Difficulty: Beginner, Intermediate, Expert and Custom options to challenge and improve your skill level
- Stats tracking to keep track of your records for each difficulty
- Pinch to zoom
- 6 different colour themes to suit your taste including classic and night mode
- Flag Mode: Press flag button to enable you to mark tiles on the board you think are bombs or simply press and hold on a tile to drop a flag
- Analyse your game on success or failure, No covering of the board at the end of each round

How to Play:
The goal of the game is to uncover all the squares that do not contain mines without being "blown up" by clicking on a square with a mine underneath. Clicking on a tile reveals a blank square or a number. Numbers represent the number of mines adjacent to the uncovered square. You can plan your strategy by flagging a tile that you think may be covering a mine. The game is won once all blank squares have been uncovered without hitting a mine.
